Setting.Name: CssClass
Setting.Help: Sets the CSS class used to render this skin object

Setting.Name: Separator
Setting.Help: Defines the separator to be used in between links

Setting.Name: Level
Setting.Help: Defines from where in the page tree links should be rendered

Setting.Name: Alignment
Setting.Help: Defines whether the links will be rendered horizontally or vertically

Setting.Name: ShowDisabled
Setting.Help: Sets whether disabled pages are displayed, defaults to False

Setting.Name: ForceLinks
Setting.Help: Sets if the links will rendered with Level "Same", if not links are returned
